title: 99 Sense to Freedom: Motivating Young Adults to achieve Inner Peace as they go through the cycles of Life.
description: A book written for the younger generation. It is a gift that baby boomer parents can share with their millennial children. It was written to share life skills for young adults that are sometimes overlooked as they proceed through life's journey. In the pages of this book is a combination of knowledge, observations, and some theories based on those observations. This self-help motivational ebook was written to help people overcome obstacles they may experience in life. The title “99 Sense to Freedom” Is based on the cost of this book and information that makes good sense to acquire. This book is written with a challenge. Can a $1.00 investment have an impact on your life?
author: Lance Dickson
